title: Enemy (Imagine Dragons and JID song)
content: "Enemy" is a song by American pop rock band Imagine Dragons and American rapper JID. It was released through Interscope Records and Kidinakorner on October 28, 2021, from the soundtrack of the animated streaming television series Arcane.  The song was written by the artists alongside Justin Tranter and the producers Mattman & Robin.[1] The song was also included on the Additional Track Version of the band's fifth studio album Mercury – Act 1. The song became JID's first song to reach the top 5 in the US, and became the band's first song to reach the top 5 since the 2017 song "Thunder". In 2023, for the 35th anniversary of Alternative Airplay – where "Enemy" charted for 54 weeks, of which 9 were spent at the top spot – Billboard ranked the song as the 14th-most successful in the chart's history.[2][3][4]
